articles.author: Tom Pilcher, CNN
articles.title: Ryder Cup gets personal: Hey! 'Golf' fans, leave those guys alone, say wives and girlfriends - CNN
articles.description: Amped up crowds will be bringing the noise to Whistling Straits this week at the Ryder Cup. In the past that din hasn't always been a pleasant cacophony -- the last time the biennial event was held on US shores Europe's Rory McIlroy was jeered about ex-girlfr…

articles.content:

articles.title: Physicists probe light smashups to guide future research: Understanding photon collisions could aid search for physics beyond the Standard Model - Science Daily
articles.description: Light has no mass, but Europe's Large Hadron Collider (LHC) can convert light's energy into massive particles. Physicists studied matter-generating collisions of light and showed the departure angle of their debris is subtly distorted by quantum interference …
articles.content: Hot on the heels of proving an 87-year-old prediction that matter can be generated directly from light, Rice University physicists and their colleagues have detailed how that process may impact futur… [+7308 chars]
